name: Wake Up! (MoistButterFeet)
description:
What is this place? It looks like you're asleep... And the only way to wake up is to destroy your own brain! Wait a second... is that... your alarm! You need to hurry up or else you're going to be late for work!

Controls

Up to Jump, Down to Duck, and Space to Shoot.

You can shoot objects with a Red outline.

Have Fun!
